Package Main.Models

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
Main.Models.Ball
public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
Public class Ball is used to create a ball for the game with the given center point and diameter. It holds all the relevant information about the ball such as colour, position and speed so that the ball can be rendered in the game. All the setters and getters required are also here.
Since:
28/11/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
TanZhunXian, Filippo Ranza

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.awt.Shape ballFace
    This variable is used to hold the shape of the ball and to move the ball to other points.
    private java.awt.Color border
    The border colour of the ball.
    private java.awt.Point center
    This point is defined as the center point of the ball.
    private int diameter
    The diameter of the ball.
    private java.awt.Point down
    This point is defined as the bottom point of the ball.
    private java.awt.Color inner
    The inner colour of the ball.
    private java.awt.Point left
    This point is defined as the left point of the ball.
    private java.awt.Point right
    This point is defined as the right point of the ball.
    private int speedX
    This is the speed of the ball in the horizontal direction.
    private int speedY
    This is the speed of the ball in the vertical direction.
    private java.awt.Point up
    This point is defined as the top point of the ball.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(java.awt.Point center, int diameter)
      This constructor creates a ball at the given center point and given diameter. The other 4 points of the ball are defined relative to the center point.
      Parameters:
      center - This is the center point of the new ball.
      diameter - This is the diameter of the new ball.

  • Method Details

    • setCenter

      public void setCenter​(java.awt.Point center)
      This method is used to set the new center point of the ball to move the ball. The other 4 points of the ball are also updated.
      Parameters:
      center - This is the new center point of the ball.

    • setPoints

      public void setPoints​(java.awt.Point center)
      This method is used to set the 4 other points of the ball when the ball moves.
      Parameters:
      center - This is the new center point of the ball.

    • getBallFace

      public java.awt.Shape getBallFace()
      This method is used to return the ball face.
      Returns:
      The ball face is returned.

    • setBallFace

      public void setBallFace​(java.awt.Shape ballFace)
      This method is used to change the ball face. It is used to move the ball to a new location to simulate movement.
      Parameters:
      ballFace - This is the new ball face of the ball.

    • getCenter

      public java.awt.Point getCenter()
      This method is used to return the center point of the ball.
      Returns:
      The center point of the ball is returned.

    • getSpeedX

      public int getSpeedX()
      This method is used to return horizontal speed of the ball.
      Returns:
      The horizontal speed of the ball is returned.

    • setSpeedX

      public void setSpeedX​(int speedX)
      This method is used to change the horizontal speed of the ball.
      Parameters:
      speedX - This is the new horizontal speed of the ball.

    • getSpeedY

      public int getSpeedY()
      This method is used to return vertical speed of the ball.
      Returns:
      The vertical speed of the ball is returned.

    • setSpeedY

      public void setSpeedY​(int speedY)
      This method is used to change the vertical speed of the ball.
      Parameters:
      speedY - This is the new vertical speed of the ball.
